title: Am I a freak if I'm male and I listen to Lil Peep? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, why would you be a freak? Tons of males listen to Lil Peep and are inspired by him to make their own music. I know that PROMANTIC seems significantly inspired by Peep and his good friend Bexey. Everyone has their own music preference, so if you like Peep, then you’re not a freak. You shouldn’t have to think that if the music your listening makes you happy my guy. So to sum it all up, guys who listen to Lil Peep should be protected, as they are amazing specimen who have wonderful taste in music.

I don't think your gender has anything to do with listening to Lil Peep. The music is ok but the lyrics are vulgar, and cynical, if you want to hear that listen, it is an alternative to the mainstream yea too freaky for me. Your actions make you a freak are you acting freaky, it that express you freak on.
Only if you’re an adult male. Lol.
